quote: Perhaps scorpions were the only ones who could save each other. Whatever lay ahead, it would always be the two of us above the rest of the universe, and woe to any who dared step in out path.
quote_letters: PERHAPS SCORPIONS WERE THE ONLY ONES WHO COULD SAVE EACH OTHER WHATEVER LAY AHEAD IT WOULD ALWAYS BE THE TWO OF US ABOVE THE REST OF THE UNIVERSE AND WOE TO ANY WHO DARED STEP IN OUT PATH
